long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Say goodbye to those super long Amazon product URLs. Convert them into simple Amazon URLs with just one click!

[How to use]
1. Install the extension.
2. Click on the extension icon while you're on an Amazon product page.
3. The URL will be transformed into a simpler format.
